pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.14: “Permission to make a blanket”, renders _santhatasammuti_. The literal meaning, “blanket permission”, is ambiguous in English.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:3.8: “At a minimum” renders _paramatā_, which normally means “at a maximum”. Yet _paramatā_ also means “in the extreme” and thus in the present case “at a minimum”.
